books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.synopsis: A story about the experiences of a young man, Holden Caulfield, in New York City.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.synopsis: The story of Scout Finch, her brother Jem, and their father Atticus in a racially divided Southern town.

books.author: George Orwell
books.synopsis: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that employs surveillance and propaganda to oppress its citizens.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.synopsis: A romantic novel that explores the themes of love, reputation, and class in early 19th-century England.
